text: Johanna "Hannie" Bruinsma-Kleijwegt (14 July 1936 â€“ 21 February 2021) was a Dutch politician. She was a member of the Labour Party. She was a member of the municipal council of East-Dongeradiel, of the provincial council of Friesland, and a Friesland provincial executive. She was mayor of Zaanstad from 1992 until 1996. Bruinsma-Kleijwegt was born in Nij Beets and died in Drachten at the age of 84. == References == Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dutch mayors Category:Dutch provincial politicians Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:Politicians from Friesland
title: Hannie Bruinsma-Kleijwegt
